REGULAR.description:
Yuga and his best friend Ranma spend their days trying to become the next viral video stars. But when Yuga finds a mysterious card in his room, he`s drawn into the world of Buddyfight, where his very own Buddy monster is waiting for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deity of Combat! Gargantua Dragon!
Tatakai no Kami! Gargantua Dragon!!
闘いの神! ガルガンチュア・ドラゴン!!

REGULAR.description:
Garga adjusts to life in the human world. Yuga begins to feels guilty about getting a Buddy before his friend Ranma, just as Ranma challenges him to a Buddyfight with Garga as the prize.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Friendship Battle! Yuga versus Ranma!
Yuujou Taiketsu! Yuuga vs Ranma!!
友情対決! 友牙VSランマ!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga meets Subaru, a brilliant but standoffish schoolmate known as the Ace of Study. At Ranma`s suggestion, Yuga and Subaru face off in a friendly Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash of the Aces! Ace of Games versus Ace of Study!
Gekitotsu! Asobi no Kami VS Benkyou no Kami!!
激突! 遊びの神VS勉強の神!!

REGULAR.description:
Masato, the Ace of Sports, transfers to Aibo Academy. Ranma is eager to have Yuga battle him in a Buddyfight...but first, they have to clear their name when Masato accuses them of pulling pranks on PalTube.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenkousei wa Sports no Kami!
The Transfer Student Is the Ace of Sports!
転校生はスポーツの神!

REGULAR.description:
Aibo Academy`s annual tradition, the ABC Cup tournament has begun. Masato`s first opponent is Banjoe Onizuka, a brawler with a bad reputation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Finally Begun! The ABC Cup!
Tsui ni Start! ABC Cup!!
ついにスタート! ABCカップ!!

REGULAR.description:
Ranma is frustrated by Yuga and Garga getting all the attention, especially when a mysterious girl shows up and declares herself to be a fan. He decides to prove his worth as a Buddyfighter by defeating Yuga in their ABC Cup match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ranma Moukou! Katsu no wa Ore Dazi!!
Ranma`s Wild Charge! I`m the One Who`ll Win!
ランマ猛攻! 勝つのはオレだぜィ!!

REGULAR.description:
Subaru`s next opponent in the ABC Cup tournament is Mel Yumegatari, a fairy tale fan with a crush on Subaru. Mel believes that Subaru is under a magical curse, and decides to save him by defeating him in a Buddyfight match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mel`s Adventures in Fairyland! Reverse Prince Subaru`s Curse!
Otogi no Kuni no Meru! Tokihanate, Subaru-sama no Noroi!
おとぎの国のメル! 解き放て, スバル様の呪い!

REGULAR.description:
The ABC Cup tournament goes on break. Miko`s connection to Yuga is finally revealed, and Miko unexpectedly gains a Buddy of her own: the deity Amaterasu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Deity Descends! Electrodeity of Light, Amaterasu!
Kourin! Hikari no Ryuujin Amaterasu!!
降臨! 光の電神アマテラス!!

REGULAR.description:
Masato discovers that his opponent in the next match, Mamoru Sekai, is secretly the heroic Cosmoman. When Cosmoman rescues him from a rampaging Illegal monster, Masato vows to help his opponent any way that he can.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Defend Peace! Galaxy Exalt, Cosmoman!
Mamore Heiwa o! Ginga Choujin Cosmoman!!
守れ平和を! 銀河超人コスモマン!!

REGULAR.description:
Ranma feels conflicted about all the attention that Yuga is getting as he heads into the ABC Cup semi-final match against Subaru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hatase Revenge! Yuuga vs Subaru!!
Win the Rematch! Yuga versus Subaru!
果たせリベンジ! 友牙VSスバル!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga and Masato prepare to face each other in the final round of the ABC Cup. But their pre-match interview takes an unexpected turn when the villainous PalTuber Da Dan makes an appearance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ABC Cup Finals! Yuga versus Masato!
ABC Cup Kesshou! Yuuga vs Masato!!
ABCカップ決勝! 友牙VSマサト!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga and Masato continue to battle in the final round of the ABC Cup. Yuga`s newfound popularity begins to take its toll on Ranma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gakuen Saikyou wa Dare Da!? Shouri o Kimeru Card!
Who`s the Academy`s Best Fighter? The Card That Decides Victory!
学園最強は誰だ!? 勝利を決めるカード!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga discovers that Ranma is moving away. Ranma challenges Yuga to one final Buddyfight, and reveals his new deck and new Buddy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lost World! Kyouran Ma Ryuu Vanity Kara Destroyer!! Zenpen
Lost World! Vile Demonic Dragon, Vanity Husk Destroyer! Part 1
ロストワールド! 凶乱魔竜ヴァニティ・骸・デストロイヤー!! ―前編―

REGULAR.description:
Yuga and Ranma`s Buddyfight continues, as Ranma reveals his true feelings and unleashes the full power of the Lost World monsters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lost World! Kyouran Ma Ryuu Vanity Kara Destroyer!! Kouhen
Lost World! Vile Demonic Dragon, Vanity Husk Destroyer! Part 2
ロストワールド! 凶乱魔竜ヴァニティ・骸・デストロイヤー!! －後編－

REGULAR.description:
As Yuga comes to terms with Ranma`s departure, his friends try to cheer him up. Garcat, Gardog and Garbird take over Ran-Ga Channel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Get Stronger, Yuga! A New Beginning!
Tsuyoku Nare Yuuga! Aratanaru Start!!
強くなれ友牙! 新たなるスタート!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga`s first opponent in the Ace Buddyfighter Play-offs is Kanesada Kaji, a master of Katana World and expert swordsman. Yuga learns Garga can adapt to different worlds, so he creates a new ninja-themed deck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shop Preliminaries Begin! Samurai Versus Ninja!
Shop Yosen Kaishi! Samurai vs Ninja!!
ショップ予選開始! 侍VS忍者!!

REGULAR.description:
Subaru introduces Yuga and the gang to his friend Seiji Kido, a chess prodigy. Vile Ranma is looking for allies, and he sets his sights on Seiji.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Checkmate! Ace of Study versus Chess Genius!
Checkmate! Benkyou no Kami vs Chess no Tensai!!
チェックメイト! 勉強の神VSチェスの天才!!

REGULAR.description:
The nasty PalTuber Da Dan offers to help Yuga and the gang improve Ran-Ga Channel, but when his true intentions are revealed Garga vows to make him pay by defeating him in a Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aratana Nakama? Warukunai Da Dan!?
Our New Ally? A Non-Evil Da Dan?!
新たな仲間? 悪くないダ★ダーン!?

REGULAR.description:
When Vile Ranma starts a new PalTube Channel in hopes of recruiting new Lost Deck users, Subaru challenges him to a Buddyfight. But with Seiji`s freedom and Subaru`s own fate on the line, the gang has a lot to lose!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ranma Channel Kaisetsu!? Lost World Futatabi!
The Vile Ranma Channel Debuts? The Return of Lost World!
乱魔チャンネル開設!? ロストワールド再び!

REGULAR.description:
Miko`s new monster wants to be her buddy and displace Amaterasu. Meanwhile, Da Dan takes a hostage to force Miko to promote his PalTube channel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nerai wa Miko! Ubawareta Neko!?
Target: Miko! A Kidnapped Cat?!
狙いはミコ! 奪われたネコ!?

REGULAR.description:
Yuga`s final opponent in the Shop Preliminaries is Banjoe Onizuka. When Yuga learns that Banjoe’s feeling down after his loss to Masato, he does his best to cheer him up and reignite his fighting spirit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuga and Banjoe! A Fiery Fight!
Yuuga to Banjou! Honoo no Fight!!
友牙とバンジョウ! 炎のファイト!!

REGULAR.description:
When a member of the school`s Kendo Club needs help controlling her love for battle, Masato and Kanesada put on a Buddyfight demonstration for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Masato ga Kanesada ka! Shop Yosen Final!!
Masato or Kanesada? Shop Preliminary Finals!
マサトかカネサダか! ショップ予選ファイナル!!

REGULAR.description:
As the second round of the Ace Buddyfighter Play-offs begin, Ranma challenges Yuga to a fight, thinking that if Subaru sees the power of Lost World in action he’ll be begging to join him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Niji Yosen Start! Ranma kara no Chousenjou!!
The Second Round Begins! A Challenge from Vile Ranma!
二次予選スタート! 乱魔からの挑戦状!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga finds a Magic World card that belonged to his father and decides to explore its possibilities. Meanwhile, the tournament AI assigns Yuga his next opponent, a wanna-be rock star named Note Hibikase.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mage Garga! A Magic World Buddyfight!
Mahou Tsukai Garuga! Magic World no Fight!!
魔法使いガルガ! マジックワールドのファイト!!

REGULAR.description:
Subaru meets the third member of Vile Ranma`s Lost World crew, Daijirou Kurayashiki. Masato reveals his past history with Daijirou and decides to challenge him to a Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lost Daisan no Fighter! Saikyou Ryuu Arawaru!!
The Third Lost World Fighter! Enter the Max Dragons!
ロスト第三のファイター! 最強竜現る!!

REGULAR.description:
Subaru’s forced to make a decision on Vile Ranma`s offer, and Yuga and the gang are shocked to learn that Subaru`s been meeting with the Lost World player. Meanwhile, a frustrated Light decides to take matters into his own hands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Lost World Ally!
Aratanaru Lost no Nakama
新たなるロストの仲間

REGULAR.description:
The Linkdragon Order reminisce about how they first joined forces with Masato. Masato tries to achieve closure through another match with Daijirou.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kizuna Ryuu Dan Tanjou Hiwa! Tsuyoku Nare Agito!!
The Secret Origin of the Linkdragon Order! Get Stronger, Agito!
絆竜団誕生秘話! 強くなれアギト!!

REGULAR.description:
Da Dan makes a deal with Vile Ranma to join Lost World, and then he and Yuga have a Buddyfight to determine who advances to the final tournament.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigeki Hisshou! Mode Gatling!!
One Shot Victory! Gattling Mode!
一撃必勝! モード・ガトリング!!

REGULAR.description:
Haru wants a Buddyfight deck for Christmas, so Yuga and the gang help him decide which world to choose. Light makes a troubling discovery about Vanity Husk Destroyer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku Datte Yaruzo! Buddyfight!
I`m Going to Play Too! Buddyfight!
ボクだってやるぞ! バディファイト!!

REGULAR.description:
Ran-Ga Channel`s popularity is plummeting, so Masato and Subaru agree to help out by broadcasting their first Buddyfight match against each other.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Katsu no wa Docchi Da!? Subaru vs Masato!!
Who Will Win? Subaru Versus Masato!
勝つのはどっちだ!? スバルVSマサト!!

REGULAR.description:
The final round competitors are invited to a party by the mysterious Eden Hanazono. Vile Ranma and Vanity Husk Destroyer initiate a plan to recruit Eden, while Garga learns of Eden`s tragic past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Satsujo no Shugosha: Hanazono Eden
The Guardian of Order, Eden Hanazono!
秩序の守護者 花園エデン

REGULAR.description:
A power-struggle between Eden and Vile Ranma leads to an unexpected evolution. Vile Ranma challenges Yuga to a Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Shinka! Kyouran Majin Ryuu Vanity Koku Destroyer!!
Major Evolution! Vile Demonic Deity Dragon, Vanity Epoch Destroyer!
大進化! 凶乱魔神竜ヴァニティ・刻・デストロイヤー!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga asks Light to help him prepare for a battle against Darkness Dragon World, while Light tries to keep his undercover activities a secret.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kurouzu Raito! Unmei no Tatakai!!
Light Kurouzu! Battle of Destiny!
黒渦ライト! 運命の闘い!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga and his friends visit Saint Order Academy in an attempt to learn more about Eden. Seiji manipulates Da Dan into an open rebellion against Vile Ranma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Da Dan Hanran! Kindan no Coup d`Etat!!
Da Dan Rebels! The Forbidden Coup d`Etat!
ダ★ダーン反乱! 禁断のクーデター!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga faces Eden in the first match of the finals. Garga reflects on his journey with Yuga, and hopes he can make his young Buddy’s dreams come true.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Garga`s Major Evolution! Activate! Deity G.Evo!
Garuga Dai Shinka! Hatsudou!! Kami G Evo!!!
ガルガ大進化! 発動!! 神G・EVO!!!

REGULAR.description:
While preparing for his battle with Vile Ranma in the finals, the mysterious  Rei Urameshi tries to sabotage his rivals.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Unhappy! Ranma vs Urameshi Rei!!
Unhappy! Vile Ranma versus Rei Urameshi!
アンハッピー! 乱魔vs怨巳矢レイ!!

REGULAR.description:
Daijirou reflects on his past with Masato, as the two prepare to settle their grudge on the Buddyfight stage. Meanwhile, the Linkdragon Order wants to raise the stakes of the match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Final Battle! Masato versus Daijirou!
Saishuu Kessen! Masato vs Taishirou!!
最終決戦! マサトVS大志郎!!

REGULAR.description:
As their match approaches, Subaru tries to win back Seiji`s friendship. His latest attempt includes a special guest appearance on Ran-Ga Channel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come Back, My Friend! Casting a Spell with a Wish!
Modore Tomo yo! Negai o Kometa Cast!!
もどれ友よ! 願いを込めたキャスト!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga and the gang pay Vile Ranma a visit before the semifinals. Then, Yuga and Masato face off in the first semifinal match as Vile Ranma looks on with interest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ace Buddyfighters, Assemble!
Kami Fighter Da yo! Zen`in Shuugou!!
神ファイターだヨ! 全員集合!!

REGULAR.description:
Subaru tries to persuade Vile Ranma to become friends with Yuga again. Vile Ranma unveils a terrifying new power during his semi-final match against Subaru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyouran Magai Jinryuu Vanity Owari Destroyer!
Vile Demonic Husk Deity Dragon, Vanity End Destroyer
凶乱魔骸神竜ヴァニティ・終・デストロイヤー!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga and the gang try to help Subaru recover his memory. Light and Commissioner Tasuku disagree over who’ll use the Anti-Lost Weapon against Destroyer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare ga Tsukau? Anti Lost Weapon!
Who Will Use It? The Anti-Lost Weapon!
誰が使う? 対ロスト兵器[アンチロスト・ウエポン]!

REGULAR.description:
As the final of the Ace Buddyfighter Play-offs between Yuga and Vile Ranma approaches, Garga prepares for his showdown against Destroyer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Final Battle! Yuga versus Vile Ranma!
Kesshousen! Yuuga vs Ranma!!
決勝戦! 友牙VS乱魔!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuga and Vile Ranma continue their explosive final match of the Ace Buddyfighter Play-offs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanate! Shinsou Ranga Gargantua Punisher!!
Let it Loose! Deity Creations Fangflare, Gargantua Punisher!
放て! 神創乱牙ガルガンチュア・パニッシャー!!
Episode 44
Kami Hikken! Buddy Card Dai Hyakka: Sono Ichi!
神必見! バディカード大百科・その一!
Episode 45
Kami Hikken! Buddy Card Dai Hyakka: Sono Ni!
神必見! バディカード大百科・その二!
Episode 46
Kami Hikken! Buddy Card Dai Hyakka: Sono San!
神必見! バディカード大百科・その三!
Episode 47
Kami Hikken! Buddy Card Dai Hyakka: Sono Yon!
神必見! バディカード大百科・その四!

WIKIPEDIA_JP: フューチャーカード_神バディファイト

titles.title: Future Card Shin Buddyfight
フューチャーカード 神バディファイト
未来卡 神搭档对战
Future Card Buddyfight Ace
